use.flag: Disable official Pale Moon branding (icons, name) which are not binary-redistributable according to upstream.
Build with user-specified compiler optimizations (-Os, -O0, -O1, -O2, -O3, -m*) from CXXFLAGS. (reasonably well supported)
Enable alternative memory allocator jemalloc.
Use the system-wide libbz2 (app-arch/bzip2) instead of bundled.
Use the system-wide x11-libs/cairo instead of bundled.
Use the system-wide libffi (dev-ruby/ffi) instead of bundled.
Use the system-wide ICU (dev-libs/icu) instead of bundled.
Use the system-wide libjpeg (media-libs/libjpeg-turbo or media-libs/jpeg) instead of bundled.
Use the system-wide dev-libs/libevent instead of bundled.
Use the system-wide media-libs/libvpx instead of bundled.
Use the system-wide dev-db/sqlite installation with secure-delete enabled
Use the system-wide Netscape Portable Runtime (dev-libs/nspr) instead of bundled.
Disable all compiler optimizations (-Os, -O0, -O1, -O2, -O3, -m*), including defaults.
Enable GNU Gold Linker (if not already forced by e.g., EXTRA_ECONF).
Use the system-wide NSS (dev-libs/nss) instead of bundled.
Use the system-wide libz (sys-libs/zlib) instead of bundled.
Use the system-wide libwebp (media-libs/libwebp) instead of bundled.
Enable Mozilla Developer Tools
Use the system-wide pixman (x11-libs/pixman) instead of bundled.
Use the system-wide libpng (media-libs/libpng) instead of bundled.
Use the system-wide spell checker (app-text/hunspell) instead of bundled.
